title: Workshop Keycloak
description: A series of scenarios that will teach you how to setup and use Keycloak

courses.title: LAB 1 - Configure Keycloak
courses.description: Set up your first Realm, Role and User.

courses.title: Lab 2 - Secure a service
courses.description: Secure a service, obtain a token and make a secure request.

courses.title: Lb 3 - Secure an application
courses.description: Secure an application, log in and make a secure request.
